examples.title: ColdFusion polyfill
examples.description: Using java data type null instead

examples.title: Use with SQL queries
examples.description: Set a database column to null when a submitted form does not contain the field
examples.code:
queryExecute("
    update foo set
    staff_group_id = isDefined('form.staff_group')?form.staff_group:nullValue()
    where bar='baz'
")
